notes.text:
This update for bouncycastle fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-15522: Fixed a timing issue within the EC math library (bsc#1186328).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Bouncy Castle BC Java before 1.66, BC C# .NET before 1.8.7, BC-FJA before 1.0.1.2, 1.0.2.1, and BC-FNA before 1.0.1.1 have a timing issue within the EC math library that can expose information about the private key when an attacker is able to observe timing information for the generation of multiple deterministic ECDSA signatures.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
